Description: You send the minds of your creatures into a world of darkness, damaging them before putting them to sleep. All creatures within 30 feet of you must make a WIS save against your Move DC, taking dark damage and falling asleep on a failure, or half as much without falling asleep on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
